item.title: Change how a website looks with Stylus and UserCSS
item.description: When using a website, the way it looks (the way itâ€™s styled) is a result of how the author has set up the CSS rules. These rules describe how the HTML should be displayed to the user in different situations. Most websites do a good job of creating something I find presentable. But sometimes I use a site a lot and start to notice things that bother me. In this case, it was the Pocket Casts web application.
